text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Since that day, I'll often spot Meisho<n>Doto training for her
big race.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Huff... O-one morelap!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Wheeze... S-so tired...No! I've got to keep going!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No matter how exhausted she looks,<n>she just keeps
pushing forward, one<n>step at a time.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: This will be... the best race everrrr!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hyah?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Heh! Impressive, Doto!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Finally, the day of the Tracen Meet<n>arrives! The stands are
filled to the<n>brim with racers who have come to<n>participate,
and those here to see<n>them.

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
Did you hear? Opera O and Doto are<n>gonna have it out in
today's<n>1,800-meter race! Check out this<n>flyer! "Doto vs.
Opera O—A Beautiful<n>Symphony!"

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
"A Symphony"? Uh... Marketing aside,<n>why Doto? I mean...
She's just gonna<n>goof up, right?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Finally, today's the day our<n>symphony will ring louder and
more<n>beautifully than any other! May the<n>best racer win,
Doto!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: R-right!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Inhale... Exhale... Okay... Shoes,check. Running number, check...Crippling nausea... None! I've got this!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
All the racers have entered the gate...<n>Who among them will
be the winner of<n>today's 1,800-meter? And... they're<n>off!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The racers have reached the third<n>corner. The favorite for
today, T.M.<n>Opera O, is in the center of the pack,<n>but clearly
has her eyes on the front!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(I-I can feel Opera O's presence...<n>Now it's just a matter of
time<n>before—)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We've reached the homestretch!<n>T.M. Opera O races
forward from the<n>outside!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: (Here she comes!)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The only fitting ending to today's<n>story is... me taking
another step down<n>the road to victory!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(Sh-she's getting farther and farther<n>away! Opera O really is
amaz—)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Eep!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Oh dear, Meisho Doto loses her<n>balance! Did she trip over
herself?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: (Why? Why now of all times?! I-I<n>really am a worthless—)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "I think tenacity's one of your strong<n>points."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: "I think tenacity's one of your strong<n>points."

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Urgh... Urrraaagh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And she quickly recovers! Now she's<n>got her eyes on
Opera O! Two hundred<n>meters to go... Will Opera O maintain<n>
her lead? Or will Doto overtake her?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: (I can catch up... I can pass her!)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Aaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
T.M. Opera O and Meisho Doto are<n>battling it out for first
place! Our winner<n>is... T.M. Opera O!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Sigh... I couldn't catchup after all...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(Still... It's nice to see so many<n>smiles... Maybe I was a
good villain<n>for Opera O after all...)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, listen to those cheers! I feel the<n>gazes of adoration
upon me!<n>Excellent! Thank you, thank you, one<n>and all!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
However, the starring role is nothing<n>without her supporting
cast! That's<n>right, I speak of the villain with an<n>indomitable
spirit, the tenacious<n>Meisho Doto!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Eh?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
She went up against my brilliant<n>genius yet still managed to
put on a<n>magnificent show! Let's hear it for<n>Meisho Doto!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooo!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Wh-what?! Th-thank you very much,<n>b-but why?!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The persistence you showed in your<n>training was beyond
my expectations,<n>just as I expected! You proved once<n>
again I was right about you!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Huh? B-but wasn't it just a<n>coincidence that you chose
me?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ha ha ha! What are you talking<n>about?! In any case, I look
forward to<n>racing you again, Doto!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Meisho Doto stands there,<n>motionless, as the thunderous<n>
applause rushes over her once more.

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
What a race! I was so scared when I<n>thought she was
gonna fall! Nice<n>recovery, Doto! You really did it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Nobody's mocking Meisho Doto now.<n>Excited, I rush down
to her side.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
So you came to watch the race too...<n>Thank you. I-I'm just
glad I was able<n>to finish... Ehehe...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: But you know... I feel like I took a step<n>forward today.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's clearly downplaying what she<n>accomplished today,
as well as how<n>hard she worked. Glancing down, I<n>see all
the bandages on her legs.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This racer has fallen countless times<n>and cried innumerable
tears. Yet every<n>time, she wiped her eyes and picked<n>
herself back up.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Wh-where did that come<n>from?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If it's change she wants, I know she<n>has what it takes to
make it happen.<n>After all... she never knows when to<n>quit.
choice_data_list: I want to see where that strength takes you.
I want to see where that strength takes you.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: W-wait... Does that mean...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: What?! A-a-are you sure you want<n>m-m-m-me?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
A-actually, I... I thought of your words<n>while I was racing
today!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
You told me my tenacity is my<n>strength... A-and that seemed
to push<n>me forward. S-so, u-um…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
You told me my tenacity is my<n>strength... A-and that seemed
to push<n>me forward. S-so, u-um…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-if you're by my side, I feel like I can<n>change! So, um, I look
forward to<n>working with you, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Stumble!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hyah! I-I stepped on your foot?!<n>A-are you okay?! Trainer?!
